text.textblock: The Foundation has determined that the Paperwork Reduction Act (44 U.S.C. chapter 35) does not apply because these regulations do not contain any information collection requirements that require the approval of the Office of Management and Budget.

signjob.textblock: For the reasons set forth in the preamble, the Inter-American Foundation, with the concurrence of the Office of Government Ethics, is amending title 5 of the Code of Federal Regulations and title 22 of the Code of Federal Regulations, as follows:
1. A new chapter LXIII, consisting of part 7301, is added to title 5 of the Code of Federal Regulations to read as follows:
PART 7301_SUPPLEMENTAL STANDARDS OF ETHICAL CONDUCT FOR EMPLOYEES OF THE INTER-AMERICAN FOUNDATION
7301.102␣Prior approval for outside teaching, speaking and writing.
